sentences.sContent: This is the truth by which vainglory is put to flight.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the truth by which vainglory is put to flight.
sentences.sCn: 这是一项真理，它能除去人贪慕虚荣的心。

sentences.sContent: He said some businessmen detest his vainglory; others brush it aside.
sentences.sContent_eng: He said some businessmen detest his vainglory; others brush it aside.
sentences.sCn: 他说，一些商人厌恶他的虚荣，其他人则不以为然。

sentences.sContent: Within weeks, though, vainglory turns into a costly and bloody quagmire.
sentences.sContent_eng: Within weeks, though, vainglory turns into a costly and bloody quagmire.
sentences.sCn: 但是， 几周之内，虚荣变成了昂贵的和血腥的泥潭。

words.tran: 虚荣心强的；非常自负的
